pages.text: $(li)Potatoes can be planted in farmland to generate more Potatoes.$(br)$(li)You can put Potatoes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/farmer)Farmers$(/l) will exchanges your potatoes by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).

$(li)You can use Potatoes to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/potato_crate)Potato Crate$(/l), or a $(l)Beef Stew$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Finally, you can cook potatoes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l) to obtain $(l)Baked Potatoes$().
